src.core.core.calculate(job)¶

main entry point for calculations

encodes the logs based on the given configuration and runs the selected task :type job: Job :param job: job configuration :rtype: (<class ‘dict’>, <class ‘dict’>) :return: results and predictive_model split

src.core.core.get_encoded_logs(job, use_cache=True)¶

returns the encoded logs

returns the training and test DataFrames encoded using the given job configuration, loading from cache if possible :type job: Job :param job: job configuration :type use_cache: bool :param use_cache: load or not saved datasets from cache :rtype: (<class ‘pandas.core.frame.DataFrame’>, <class ‘pandas.core.frame.DataFrame’>) :return: training and testing DataFrame

src.core.core.get_run(job)¶

defines the job’s identity

returns a string indicating the job configuration in an unique way

Parameters:job (Job) – job configuration
Return type:str
Returns:job’s identity string
